notes: The New York Islanders announced D Alexander Romanov is considered day-to-day.

Joseph is OUT for Saturday's (Nov. 2) game against Toronto.
Rust is week-to-week, per TV Play-by-Play announcer Josh Getzoff.
Andersen is week-to-week after the goaltender was re-evaluated yesterday for his lower-body injury.
McDavid is without an exact timeline to return but is expected to miss 2-to-3 weeks.
Colorado Avalanche's F Ross Colton is expected to miss 6-8 weeks.
Lazar underwent a successful left knee procedure. He is out indefinitely, and updates will be provided as available.

Johnson will miss significant time but will not require surgery, per Aaron Portzline of The Athletic.

The Toronto Maple Leafs placed F Calle Jarnkrok on the Injured Reserve.
Brindley has been placed on injured reserve and is expected to miss 4 to 6 weeks.

Grosenick underwent successful surgery to repair a torn anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee and will not play this season. He is expected to make a full recovery and be ready for the start of the 2025-26 season.
Reinbacher underwent surgery to his left knee this morning and is out 5-to-6 months.

Gibson who is still on IR will travel with Anaheim on their upcoming road trip against the Rangers.
